title: "Zoom updates terms of service to clarify that it won’t use your calls to train AI"
excerpt: "Zoom does not use any of your audio, video, chat, screen sharing, attachments or other communications-like Customer Content (such as poll results, whiteboard and reactions) to train Zoom or third-party artificial intelligence models."
